DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine Vortioxetine 20 mg/day lead change neural activity ( BOLD signal ) , measure use fMRI , brain area associate executive function memory cognitive task performance compare placebo subject remit depression control , explore Vortioxetine lead improve cognitive performance absence depression .
